docs.title: Welcome to Documentation Center
docs.text: Here you will find documentation for services used in our company.

docs.title: How is Documentation Center different from the Storage?
docs.text: Documentation Center complements the Storage and now serves as the primary location for documentation. The Storage remains the centralized storage for all other documents associated with services.

docs.title: Documentation versions
docs.text: Documentation in the Documentation Center is versioned so you can view documents tailored to specific releases.
